name: Padlet Shortcode
author: Nitesh Goel / Padlet

sections.description:
Allows the use of special short codes [padlet] and [wallwisher] for embedding Padlet walls. The short code can be found in the Share section of a wall’s sidebar on padlet.com

Example:
[padlet key=”8ftvxj” height=”480″ width=”100%”]

or

[wallwisher key="8ftvxj" height="480" width="100%"]
sections.installation:
For old school manual installation: copy the folder “padlet-shortcode” into the /wp-content/plugins/ folder. Then go to the Plugins area of the Admin and activate.

For automatic installation: Goto Plugins > Add New in the admin area of your wordpress blog. Search for “Padlet Shortcode” and install the plugin that shows up in the search results.
